column1: Smoque BBQ////let's keep this short and sweet.......great place to get your bbq fix.  pulled pork is nothing special
column2: i suggest you go for the beef brisket.  if you aren't going to order the fries
column3: you should just forget about the whole meal.  the fries are crispy little spears of perfection.......... let me explain:  perfectly crisp on the outside
column4: light and fluffy on the inside.  hurry up and go eat!
